section.para: The Mass Expire Component Item feature will save you time whenever you need to expire components that are used in multiple Bills of Materials. To perform a mass expiration of a component Item, select the "Mass Expire Component Item" option. The following screen will appear:
When performing a mass expiration of a component Item, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Enter the Item Number of the component Item you want to mass expire.
The specified component Item will be expired from existing Bills of Materials as of the specified expiration date.
